item.title: Simson Says EU Still in Talks on Renewables Deal (Video)
item.description: The European Union is in talks with member states to increase the bloc’s renewable energy target to 40% by 2030. The current target is 32%. The talks are being led by Energy Commissioner Kadri Simson. Simson said on Tuesday that she is confident that a deal can be reached.
